trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> ha un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> contenente <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> oggetti raccolti stilo dal digitalizzatore.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> per personalizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to draw a circle at each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> comprising a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente esegue l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.DrawCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> metodo consente di disegnare un cerchio in ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> che comprendono un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> method returns the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.FitToCurve%2A> è impostata su `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.GetBezierStylusPoints%2A> il metodo restituisce i punti dello stilo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> property returns the stylus points.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints%2A> restituisce i punti dello stilo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente raccoglie <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> metodo di un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> specificando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> e le dimensioni iniziali del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Un IEnumerable generico di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="points" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di <paramref name="points" /> è zero.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> have incompatible <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> hanno oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> incompatibili.

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Un IEnumerable generico di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> che specifica gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class with specified points.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> con i punti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="points" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="points" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="points" /> is 0.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di <paramref name="points" /> è zero.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> che <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> può contenere inizialmente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that may initially contain the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che può contenere inizialmente il numero specificato di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, you specify it's `initialCapacity`.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, specificare che sia `initialCapacity`.

trans-unit.source: However, you can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile aggiungere più <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> oggetti chiamando le <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente raccoglie <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> metodo di un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying both the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> specificando sia il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> e le dimensioni iniziali del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> è negativo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che specifica le proprietà aggiuntive archiviate in ciascun oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that contains the properties specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> contenente le proprietà specificate nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects added to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that is compatible with `stylusPointDescription`.
trans-unit.target: Tutti <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti aggiunti al <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> deve avere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> compatibile con `stylusPointDescription`.

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente raccoglie <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> metodo di un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> specificando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> e le dimensioni iniziali del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that specifies the additional properties stored in each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che specifica le proprietà aggiuntive archiviate in ciascun oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> can initially contain.
trans-unit.target: Numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> che <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> può contenere inizialmente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> class that is the specified size and contains the properties specified in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che è la dimensione specificata e contiene le proprietà specificate nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> is created with the capacity to hold the specified number of <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> viene creato con la capacità per contenere il numero specificato di <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: You can add more <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects than `initialCapacity` by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere più <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di `initialCapacity` chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente raccoglie <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> metodo di un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> and the initial size of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> specificando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> e le dimensioni iniziali del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="initialCapacity" /> è negativo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPointDescription" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> to add to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> specificato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The following example collects <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> method of a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente raccoglie <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnStylusDown%2A> metodo di un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> di <paramref name="stylusPoints" /> non è compatibile con la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando la proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> viene modificata.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed> evento.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> is connected to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> connesso a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that contains copies of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che contiene copie degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come copiare un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a stroke comprised of members of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and adds them to an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene creato un tratto costituito da membri del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e li aggiunge a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkcanvs1`.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio si presuppone che sia presente un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> chiamato `inkcanvs1`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> associato agli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> presenti nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> associato agli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> presenti nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> and gets the information for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene ottenuto il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> e ottiene le informazioni per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> nel <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui deve essere inserito l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> da inserire in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> di <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> non è compatibile con la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater or equal to the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è maggiore o uguale al numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Changed" />.

trans-unit.source: The stylus point collection to convert to a point array.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di punti dello stilo da convertire in una matrice di punti.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> into a point array.
trans-unit.target: Converte un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> in una matrice di punti.

trans-unit.source: A point array that contains points that correspond to each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di punti che contiene punti che corrispondono a ciascun <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to erase the strokes that are surrounded by a lasso.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come cancellare i tratti circondate da un lazo.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> called `presenter`.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio si presuppone che sia presente un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> chiamato `presenter`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> to intersect with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> da intersecare con l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Finds the intersection of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Trova l'intersezione della proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificata e la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> that has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that is a subset of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> that the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> che ha un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che è un sottoinsieme dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> specificato e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> che viene utilizzato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo` è un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> che descrive un subset di valori appartenenti al <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> che interseca il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> corrente <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> metodo restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> che contiene lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> oggetti come quelli che appartengono all'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> oggetti nel nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> Usa `subsetToReformatTo` come il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> utilizza vincoli dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> del <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> proprietà, anche se i vincoli in `subsetToReformatTo` sono diversi.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se `subsetToReformatTo` utilizza i valori 0 e 1023 per <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> mentre <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> utilizza i valori 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Reformat%2A> Restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> utilizzando i valori 0 e 255.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that uses a different <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> che utilizza un altro <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subsetToReformatTo" /> is not a subset of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subsetToReformatTo" /> non è un sottoinsieme della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to remove the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui rimuovere l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> at the specified position from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in corrispondenza della posizione specificata dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> is connected to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> and there is only one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" /> è connesso a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> ed è presente soltanto un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to set the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui deve essere impostato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> to set at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> da impostare in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> specificato in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> of <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> is not compatible with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" /> property.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription" /> di <paramref name="stylusPoint" /> non è compatibile con la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è maggiore del numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the property values of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> objects into a 32-bit signed integer array.
trans-unit.target: Converte i valori della proprietà degli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint" /> in una matrice integre con segno a 32-bit.
